concept.title: Who Qualifies as a Resident?
concept.shortdesc: Like other government services, library card applicants must be residents of the County to apply, but the qualifications for resident in this case.

conbody.p: For the purposes of getting a library card only, a resident is anyone who:

ul.li: Is currently employed at a business with an address in Fulton County
Currently attends a school in Fulton County
